alert.note: Alert for Adams; Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 3:21AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LANCASTER...YORK... ADAMS...LEBANON...AND DAUPHIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half of a mile. Snowfall rates within this band are around 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 320 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Myerstown to Elizabethtown to Weigelstown to Gettysburg. The heavy snow band was nearly stationary. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... York, Lebanon, Hanover, Hershey, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Middletown, Mount Joy, Palmyra, Parkville, Manheim, Myerstown, Hampton, Shiloh, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, Annville, West York and Salunga-Landisville. * This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 251 to 278. Interstate 83 from mile markers 13 to 32. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
